item.title: 哥伦比亚电力公司将从挪威国家电力公司收购 10 家可再生能源公司
item.description: 哥伦比亚国营石油公司 Ecopetrol 周二表示，该公司已与挪威国家电力公司（Statkraft）签署协议，收购 10 家风能和太阳能项目开发公司。【原文：Colombia's state-run oil company Ecopetrol said on Tuesday it had signed an agreement with Norway's Statkraft to buy 10 wind and solar energy project development companies.】

item.title: 史诗游戏公司的《堡垒之夜》重新登陆美国苹果应用商店和欧盟 Epic 游戏商店
item.description: Epic Games 周二表示，该公司的视频游戏 "堡垒之夜"（Fortnite）在美国的苹果应用商店以及欧盟的 Epic Games Store 和 AltStore 上再次上架。【原文：Epic Games' "Fortnite" video game was available again in the U.S. on Apple's App Store and on the Epic Games Store and AltStore in the European Union, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Wolfspeed 准备在数周内申请破产
item.description: 华尔街日报》周二援引熟知内情的消息人士的话报道，半导体供应商 Wolfspeed 正准备在几周内申请破产，因为该公司正努力解决债务问题。【原文：Semiconductor supplier Wolfspeed is preparing to file for bankruptcy within weeks, as it struggles to address its debt pile, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 由于通信业务需求强劲，Keysight 第二季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 电子设备制造商 Keysight Technologies 周二公布的第二季度营收和利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于其通信业务部门的强劲销售，该公司股价盘后上涨 5%。【原文：Electronic equipment maker Keysight Technologies beat Wall Street expectations for second-quarter revenue and profit on Tuesday, driven by strong sales in its communications segment, sending its shares up 5% after the bell.】

item.title: 包装食品需求放缓，卡夫亨氏寻求并购机会
item.description: 包装食品巨头卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）表示，由于经济环境不确定和高通胀率，消费者对其价格昂贵的零食和即食食品的需求减弱，该公司正在考虑进行战略交易。【原文：Packaged foods giant Kraft Heinz said it was looking at strategic transactions as consumer demand for its pricey snacks and ready-to-eat meals weakens due to an uncertain economic environment and high inflation.】

item.title: 交易日：日本长期债券警告
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: 特朗普冻结资金后，欧盟将向自由欧洲电台拨款 550 万欧元
item.description: 欧盟外交政策负责人卡亚-卡拉斯（Kaja Kallas）周二表示，在特朗普政府冻结美国联邦政府对自由欧洲电台的拨款后，欧盟将捐赠550万欧元（约合620万美元）支持该媒体。【原文：The European Union will donate 5.5 million euros ($6.2 million) to support Radio Free Europe following a freeze on U.S. federal grants to the media outlet by the Trump administration, EU foreign policy chief Kaja Kallas said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿根廷批准价值 25 亿美元的力拓锂矿开采项目
item.description: 阿根廷政府周二批准了英澳巨头力拓公司价值 25 亿美元的锂矿开采项目，这是阿根廷在新的投资激励机制下实施的首个采矿项目。【原文：Argentina's government on Tuesday approved a $2.5 billion lithium mining project by Anglo-Australian giant Rio Tinto, marking the first mining project under a new investment incentive regime.】

item.title: 马萨诸塞州黑客将对 PowerSchool 数据泄露事件认罪
item.description: 马萨诸塞州一名男子同意认罪，承认黑客入侵云教育软件提供商 PowerSchool 并窃取了数百万学生和教师的相关数据，黑客利用这些数据勒索该公司和学区支付赎金。【原文：A Massachusetts man has agreed to plead guilty to hacking cloud-based education software provider PowerSchool and stealing data pertaining to millions of students and teachers that hackers used to extort the company and school districts into paying ransoms.】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克：美国经济可能正处于加息潮的边缘
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周二表示，美国企业可能已经用完了推迟改变价格或就业以应对进口税提高的策略，经济可能处于价格上涨浪潮的边缘。【原文：U.S. businesses may have run out of strategies to delay changing prices or employment in response to higher import taxes, with the economy possibly on the brink of a wave of price increases, Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 穆迪下调评级波及债券市场，引发股市担忧
item.description: 穆迪下调美国债务评级引发了投资者的担忧，他们可能会重新评估对美国政府债券的偏好，而收益率的上升可能会给估值较高的股票带来压力。【原文：Moody's U.S. debt downgrade is raising concerns that investors could reevaluate their appetite for U.S. government bonds, with the potential for rising yields to put pressure on stocks that are trading at elevated valuations.】

item.title: 保险经纪公司 Acrisure 在贝恩资本领投的新一轮融资中估值 320 亿美元
item.description: Acrisure 首席执行官周二告诉路透社记者，该公司已从贝恩资本和其他投资者处筹集到 21 亿美元，公司估值达 320 亿美元，这使其能够为向核心保险经纪业务以外的产品扩张提供资金。【原文：Acrisure has raised $2.1 billion from Bain Capital and other investors, its CEO told Reuters on Tuesday, valuing the firm at $32 billion and allowing it to fund an expansion into products beyond its core insurance brokerage business.】

item.title: 德国芯片制造商英飞凌将与英伟达合作开发电源传输芯片
item.description: 德国芯片制造商英飞凌（Infineon）周二表示，将与英伟达（Nvidia）合作开发用于人工智能数据中心内新型电力传输系统的芯片。【原文：German chipmaker Infineon said on Tuesday it will work with Nvidia on developing chips for new power delivery systems inside artificial intelligence data centers.】

item.title: 马斯克说，特斯拉将于 6 月底在得克萨斯州奥斯汀市启动机器人出租车试验项目。
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周二表示，机器人轴测试将于 6 月底在德克萨斯州奥斯汀如期开始。【原文：Tesla Chief Executive Elon Musk on Tuesday said a test of robotaxis would begin on schedule in Austin, Texas by the end of June.】

item.title: 官员称美国将宣布削减纽瓦克航班以减少拥堵
item.description: 航空公司官员周二表示，美国运输部将于周二宣布，在与美国主要航空公司举行会议以解决拥堵影响问题后，将继续临时削减纽瓦克机场的航班。【原文：The U.S. Transportation Department will announce on Tuesday that it is moving forward with temporary cuts to flights at Newark after meetings with major U.S. airlines to address congestion impacts, airline officials said Tuesday.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 的 Nearmap 将以超过 13 亿美元的价格收购保险科技公司 itel
item.description: Thoma Bravo 支持的 Nearmap 公司周二表示，该公司已同意从私募股权公司 GTCR 手中收购保险技术提供商 itel，以扩大其在房地产投资组合方面的服务。【原文：Thoma Bravo-backed Nearmap has agreed to buy insurance technology provider itel from private equity firm GTCR, the companies said on Tuesday, as it looks to expand its offerings across property portfolios.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨莱姆：政策不确定性对经济前景有 "重大 "影响
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆（Alberto Musalem）周一表示，特朗普政府的贸易和其他政策的高度不确定性可能会导致经济大幅放缓，因为家庭和企业在等待更加明朗的前景时会暂缓支出和投资决策。【原文：High uncertainty over the Trump administration's trade and other policies could slow the economy significantly as households and businesses put spending and investment decisions on hold while they wait for more clarity, St. Louis Federal Reserve Bank president Alberto Musalem said on Monday.】

item.title: 巴西 Gol 航空公司称美国法院批准重组计划
item.description: 巴西 Gol 航空公司周二表示，其破产保护程序下的重组计划已获美国法院批准。【原文：Brazilian airline Gol said on Tuesday its restructuring plan under Chapter 11 bankruptcy proceedings has been approved by a U.S. court.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨勒姆称，如果贸易紧张局势持久缓和，利率可能保持不变
item.description: 圣路易斯联储主席阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆（Alberto Musalem）周二表示，即使在中美贸易缓和之后，劳动力市场看起来仍有可能走弱，物价也有可能走高，但只要公众继续预期通胀率将降至美国中央银行2%的目标，针对这一具有挑战性的组合采取平衡的货币政策对策仍然是 "可行的"。【原文：Even after the U.S. and China trade detente, the labor market looks likely to weaken and prices to head higher, but as long as the public continues to expect inflation to fall to the U.S. central bank's 2% goal, a balanced monetary policy response to that challenging mix remains "feasible," St. Louis Federal Reserve President Alberto Musalem said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息称中国五矿要求刚果解除钴出口禁令
item.description: 三位消息人士告诉路透社，世界顶级钴矿公司中国五矿集团上周呼吁刚果民主共和国解除对电池金属的出口禁令，该禁令目前将于下月到期。【原文：China's CMOC Group , the world's top cobalt mining company, called on Democratic Republic of Congo last week to lift a ban on exports of the battery metal, which is currently due to expire next month, three sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果将向开发者开放其人工智能模型
item.description: 彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道称，苹果公司正准备允许第三方开发人员使用其人工智能模型编写软件，以推动新应用的开发。【原文：Apple is preparing to allow third-party developers to write software using its artificial intelligence models, in a push to boost the creation of new applications, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 新日铁仍致力于全面收购美国钢铁公司 - 高管
item.description: 日本新日铁仍致力于收购美国钢铁公司的全部股份，一位高级管理人员表示，该公司正在寻求与美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）会面，以澄清唐纳德-特朗普总统对这一交易的立场。【原文：Japan's Nippon Steel remains committed to acquiring a full stake in U.S. Steel , a senior executive said, adding that it is seeking a meeting with U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent to clarify President Donald Trump's stance on the deal.】

item.title: 安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）支持的工作室 Promise 与谷歌合作开发人工智能，并增加了投资者
item.description: 由风险投资公司安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）支持的生成式人工智能工作室 Promise 周二表示，它已与 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司合作，使用其人工智能技术。【原文：Generative AI studio Promise, backed by venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz, said on Tuesday that it had partnered with Alphabet's Google to use its AI technologies.】

item.title: 美国贸易小组的投票为对许多太阳能进口产品征收严格关税铺平了道路
item.description: 美国国际贸易委员会（U.S. International Trade Commission）周二认定，来自东南亚四国的大量廉价进口商品对美国国内太阳能电池板制造商造成了实质性损害或威胁，从而使美国向对这些商品征收严厉关税的目标又迈近了一步。【原文：The U.S. International Trade Commission determined on Tuesday that domestic solar panel makers were materially harmed or threatened by a flood of cheap imports from four Southeast Asian nations, bringing the United States a step closer to imposing stiff duties on those goods.】

item.title: 微软将在其 GitHub 服务中添加 Anthropic 的人工智能编码代理
item.description: 微软表示，将在其 GitHub 服务中添加谷歌支持的初创公司 Anthropic 的人工智能编码代理。【原文：Microsoft said it will add an artificial intelligence coding agent from Google-backed startup Anthropic to its GitHub service.】

item.title: 华尔街监管机构为大幅裁员辩护
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）新任主席保罗-阿特金斯（Paul Atkins）周二向国会表示，尽管该机构最近大幅削减了人员编制，但华尔街的最高监管机构仍有能力监管市场。【原文：Wall Street's top regulator remains capable of policing markets despite steep recent cuts to agency staffing, Paul Atkins, the newly installed chairman of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, told Congress on Tuesday.】

item.title: 尽管奢侈品市场波澜不惊，香奈儿仍将继续投资
item.description: 法国奢侈品集团香奈儿（Chanel）周二表示，尽管中国和美国市场动荡不安，但香奈儿今年仍将利用其雄厚的资金继续大力投资，并计划在中国和美国开设新店。【原文：French luxury group Chanel will continue to invest heavily this year, drawing on its deep pockets as other sector players pull back, with plans for new stores in China and the United States, despite volatility in both markets, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国参议院将于本周就禁止加州 2035 年电动车计划的法案进行表决
item.description: 美国参议院多数党领袖约翰-图恩（John Thune）周二表示，美国参议院计划在本周进行投票，禁止加利福尼亚州到 2035 年停止销售纯汽油车的里程碑式计划，该计划已被其他 11 个州采纳。【原文：The U.S. Senate plans to vote this week to bar California's landmark plan to end the sale of gasoline-only vehicles by 2035 that has been adopted by 11 other states, Majority Leader John Thune said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 参议员就《60 分钟》试图与特朗普和解一事质询派拉蒙公司的雷德斯通
item.description: 周一，一群参议员致信派拉蒙全球董事长莎莉-雷德斯通，希望了解哥伦比亚广播公司新闻频道（CBS News）所有者为解决与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的诉讼所做的努力。【原文：A group of senators sent a letter to Paramount Global chair Shari Redstone on Monday, seeking information about the CBS News owner's efforts to settle a lawsuit with U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 天气将影响俄罗斯最大谷物产区的收成
item.description: 当地谷物游说团体负责人在宣布农业紧急状态后表示，未来几个月的高温和缺雨天气预计将导致俄罗斯最大的谷物产区罗斯托夫的收成减少。【原文：High temperatures and a lack of rain over the coming months are expected to deplete the harvest in Russia's largest grain region Rostov, the head of the local grain lobby group said after a farming emergency was declared.】
